tasks.Description: Develop a Terraform script to create a new EBS volume and attach it to the new EC2 instance.
tasks.Title: Create Terraform script for EBS volume and EC2 attachment

tasks.Description: Create a TechOps ticket to mount the new EBS volume to the EC2 instance.
tasks.Title: Submit TechOps ticket for EBS volume mounting

tasks.Description: Mount the EBS volume to the EC2 instance at the specified path (/dev/mapper/datadg-appdata /appdata).
tasks.Title: Mount EBS volume to EC2 instance

tasks.Description: Configure the IHDC service to log data to the new /appdata location.
tasks.Title: Configure IHDC logging to new appdata location

tasks.Description: Update the release notes to reflect the changes made for the new EBS volume and logging configuration.
tasks.Title: Update release notes for EBS volume and logging changes
